result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph Lee Childs

records.addlTxt: Recv'd call from defendants girlfriend asking what def needs to do for missing court, writer stated to turn self into jail.

2:22 PM Attorney Blake Gross appeared by video for Joseph Lee Childs.  Attorney Ruth Diane Kressel appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Joseph Lee Childs not in court.  Cases 21CF190, 21CF216, and 22CF164.  Atty no information.  State asking for a warrant and ff of bond if no response in 30 days.  Atty not sure where client is. 
 Court orders warrant for each case BOW, ff of bond send notice if no response within 30 days judgment to enter.  Motions in case, motions to withdraw, mutual decision, court grants the motion in each of the cases.  Atty was court appointed on all three cases.
ACJ payment receipt, Bail Bond Info Sheet from ACJ, Notice RE Posting Bond form and a copy of signed cash bond

2:19 PM Defendant Joseph Lee Childs in court.  Attorney Blake Gross in court for Joseph Lee Childs.  Attorney Lynne Van Hollen appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Cases 21CF190, 21CF216, and 22CF164.  
22CF164 is initial appearance Atty is not appointed in that case, Atty has not been appointed.  
22CF190 and 21CF216 STC.  Atty is going to be filing a motion to withdraw in cases.  Atty is appointed by county appointment after PD office was not able to find representation for def.  Atty filing motion now.  22CF164 will track.
Motion hearing scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Motion hearing on October 24, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Email FROM jail advising def has bailed out of jail and is no longer in custody;  ka
Email sent to ACJ advising def has court on Oct 10;  ka

COVERS CASES 21CF216, 21CF190, AND 22CF164
ALREADY HAS $750 POSTED

COVERS CASES 21CF216, 21CF190, AND 22CF164
ALREADY HAS $750 POSTED
Initial appearance on October 10, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

11:25 AM Defendant Joseph Lee Childs appeared by video, in custody from ACJ.  Attorney Ruth Diane Kressel appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Special appearance Atty Zimmer.  Cases 21CF190, 21CF216, and 22CF164.  Warrants quashed, order to vacate forfeiture of bond, bond to cover all three cases.  Not employed.  Is on probation.  State comments on bail/bond.  Atty comments bail/bond.  Gross is appointed in 22CF164 if he accepts.  STC in 21 cases and initial appearance in 22CF164.  Court orders $3000 cash def has $750 posted.  If at liberty to make in person appearances for the cases.
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
